attributes.action: THE CONSERVATIVE PARTY: A KNOWN EU REMAINER  MUST BE PREVENTED FROM BECOMING PM
attributes.additional_details: We the British citizens who voted Brexit expect a PM to be selected from the Leave Campaign in order to follow through a FULL exit from the EU on the principles outlined. We would NOT therefore accept Theresa May or Stephen Crabb who opposed this view to be the PM to implement Brexit and we would NOT trust them to follow through Britain's FULL exodus from the EU.  This would be a violation of the democratic right of the British people who overwhelmingly voted for BREXIT.
attributes.background: The electorate overwhelmingly voted to exit the EU on June 23rd which was fought on the principles of the Leave campaign. These were a points based Immigration system, NO free movement of ppl.  FULL return of sovereignty which no EUCHR court could overrule and immediate triggering of Article 50
